(you are using steam beta,greenluma might crash)?!!!
how to fix this ?!!

@Firas2501 
1) Start Normal steam (not Cracked)
2) Now click on "Settings"
3)Go to "Account" and Beta Participation 
4)Click Change
5)Select "None - Opt out of all beta programs"
6) OK

Now Exit out of Steam, then start cracked steam.
Should work now

Hope this Helps :D
